_header: Listeneth both great and small / I will you tellen a little tale
Subjects: Theophilus, saint, legend of; miracles; Virgin Mary, miracles of

BodRawPoe225.First Lines:
Listenyth bothe gret & smaleI wil ȝow tellen alitel
                    tale…
BodRawPoe225.Last Lines:
…þer sche with hir sone euer isþat was of hir
                    born
BodRawPoe225.Attributed Title:
Hic incipit historia quomodo Tiofelus vendidit animam suam diabolo &
                        quomodo per sanctam mariam deliberatus fuit (f. 11); Explicit
                        Tyofle (f. 15)
